"Now that we've made it this far, we can: "So wait..."
"We... We survived?"
"ガヤ：アイナ隊モブアークス⑤"
"Phew... We managed to fight our way out of there."

"In front of the recruits, I put on a brave face and
just said everything will be alright, but deep down I was terrified."

"I was like,
\"What if I make a mistake and someone gets injured?\"..."

"I'm glad I was able to learn
so much from so many different leaders."
"You did great."
"You're a proper Instructor now."
"Thanks..."
"But that praise should be given to the recruits."
"It's all because everyone worked together."
"They really did great out there..."
"Instructor Aina!"
"Thank you so much!"
"A-And also..."
"I'm sorry!"
"This all happened because of me..."

"Nope. I didn't properly convey how strong
the enemies were going to be. It was my fault."

"I should be the one to apologize,
for putting you all in danger like that."
"Aw, Instructor..."
"May I ask you something?"
"Huh? What is it?"
"How did you know about my leg?"
"You injured it when you went out to train in secret, right?"
"I keep an eye on my recruits, you know."
"Well, what about my fighting style?"

"You said I should fight by making
the enemy run towards me instead..."

"It's easier for you to fight with a
bit of distance between you and your target, right?"
"But you've always been charging towards your targets."
"Er, right."
"But I've only noticed that myself just recently..."

"I'm not sure why, because I've always been
telling you to watch your distance."

"Next time, trying a different kind of weapon
might not be a bad idea either, don't you think?"
"Umm... One more thing."

"Why did you shoot up into the sky
during that fight back there?"
"Oh, that?"
"I wanted to signal our position."

"I thought that, if <%me> was in the area,
they'd notice it immediately."
"I knew as soon as I saw it."
"I would've had trouble finding you if it weren't for that."
"Well I'm glad I got the message across!"
"Is that the \"power of a bond\" thing?"
"Hahaha... I think this might be a little bit different."

"I'd say that was more of a general ability
to make a decision in the heat of battle."
"But you two moved as though you knew each other's thoughts!"

"You hadn't even coordinated a plan with each other beforehand,
and yet you moved without hesitation!"
"That kind of blew me away as well."
"So this is how the heroes who defeated Dark Falz fight together..."
"We'll try our best to be able to fight like you two one day!"
"Right, Luka?!"

"...I-It's not like I intended on
pairing up with you forever, you know..."
"Huh? A-Aw, don't be like that..."
"Hehehe. Let's just get back to Aelio first, alright?"
"Then we can all talk at leisure."
